			<h1 itemprop="headline">Facebook Is Top Social Choice in Indonesia</h1>

			<h2 itemprop="description">Instagram is second</h2>
                        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-11T00:00:00.0000000-05:00"/>

			<div id="articleInfo">
                        February 11, 2016
        <span class="thin">|</span> <a href="/topics/Social-Media/1045">Social Media</a>
    

                        </div>
                         
                        <div id="articleToolShare">
                        <ul id="articleTool">
                        <li data-analytics="article_toolbar_share" id="shareTxt">
                        Share <span data-analytics="ST-gpShare2" class="gp-share st_googleplus_custom" displaytext="Google +"></span>
 <span data-analytics="ST-inShare2" class="in-share st_linkedin_custom" displaytext="LinkedIn"></span>
 <span data-analytics="ST-fbShare2" class="fb-share st_facebook_custom" displaytext="Facebook"></span>
 <span data-analytics="ST-twShare2" class="tw-share st_twitter_custom" displaytext="Twitter" st_via="eMarketer"></span></li>
                        <li id="email"><a href="/Articles/Email.aspx?R=1013579" id="emailLink">Email</a></li>
                        <li id="print"><a href="/Articles/Print.aspx?R=1013579" id="printLink">Print</a></li>
                        </ul>
                        </div>

                        <div itemprop="articleBody">
			<p>Facebook is king of the social networks among younger adults who use the mobile internet in Indonesia, but Instagram is not far behind, according to January research.</p>
 
<p><div itemprop="image" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><img src="/images/chart_gifs/204001-205000/204304.gif" alt="Leading Instagram Activities of Instagram Users Ages 16-35 in Indonesia, Jan 2016 (% of respondents)"><meta itemprop="url" content=/images/chart_gifs/204001-205000/204304.gif></div></p>
<P>Mobile research firm <a href="http://jakpat.net/" target="blank">JakPat</a> found that 87.5% of mobile internet users ages 16 to 35 used Facebook in the past week. That made Facebook the top social choice. Facebook-owned Instagram came in second, with 69.2% of respondents&mdash;far ahead of Twitter, at 41.3%, and the only service besides Facebook itself to reach a majority of respondents.</p>
<P>Facebook held the lead and Instagram held its second-place spot among subgroups broken out by age. A high of 73.8% of respondents ages 20 to 25 used Instagram. Its reach was lower among 30- to 35-year-olds, at 55.8%.</p>
<p>Touching up and posting photos, however, does not appear to be one of the top uses of the visually focused mobile social network in Indonesia. Users were most interested in exploring other accounts: Checking out accounts oriented around online shopping and jokes were the only Instagram activities with a majority of users participating.</p>
<P>Posting travel photos was nearly as popular, however, at 48.4%.</p>
<P>eMarketer estimates that Indonesia will be home to 82.0 million social network users this year, up 13.5% over 2015. About three in four will use Facebook. More than nine in 10 social network users in Indonesia check out social sites via mobile phone.</p>
</div>

<script>
$(document).ready(function(){

	// Make min-height of left column equal the height of the right column
	var rightHeight = $("#articleRight .clearCol").offset().top + 100;
	$("#articleLeft").css("min-height", rightHeight);

	var stopStick2 = null;
	var widgetHeight = null;
	var absIt = null;
	var spacer = $("#spacer");
	var socialLeft = $("#sharingLeft");

	// find the charts and interview headshots & label accordingly
	var isChart = $("#articleLeft img[src*='chart']");
	var isNotChart = $("#articleLeft img:not([src*='chart'])");

	isChart.addClass("chart");
	isNotChart.addClass("nonChart");

	$("#articleLeft img.chart").first().addClass("chart1");
	$("#articleLeft p").slice(0,2).addClass("leadPara");

	(function ($) {
 
        var promo = $("#articlePromo");

        // Wait for page structure to load
        // then find top position of articlePromo
        setTimeout(function(){
			widgetHeight = $("#sharingLeft").height();
			stopStick2 = $("#stopStick").offset().top - (widgetHeight + 65);
			absIt = $("#stopStick").offset().top - (widgetHeight + 355);
		},400);

        var scrollContext = function (element) {
            this.isFixed = false;
            this.isAbs = false;
            this.startingPoint = element.offset().top - 49;
            this.element = element;
        }
     
        scrollContext.prototype.getCss = function (scrollbarPosition) {
     
            var shouldBeFixed = scrollbarPosition > this.startingPoint;
            var shouldBeAbs = scrollbarPosition > stopStick2;
     
            if (shouldBeFixed == true && this.isFixed == false && shouldBeAbs == false) {
                this.isFixed = true;
                this.isAbs = false;
                $("#spacer").show();
                return {
                    position: 'fixed',
                    top: 0,
                    left: 'auto',
                    'padding-top': '30px',
                    width: this.element.width()
                };
            }
     
            if (shouldBeFixed == false && shouldBeAbs == false && this.isFixed == true) {
                this.isFixed = false;
                this.isAbs = false;
                $("#spacer").hide();
                return {
                	position: 'static',
                    'padding-top': '0'
                };
            }

            if (shouldBeFixed == true && this.isFixed == true && shouldBeAbs == true) {
                this.isFixed = false;
                this.isAbs = true;
                return {
                    position: 'absolute',
                    top: absIt
                };
            }
     
            return null;
        };

     
        $.fn.floatingElement = function () {
          
            return this.each(function () {
                var element = $(this);
                var context = new scrollContext(element);
                var w = $(window);
     
                w.scroll(function () {
                    var scrollbarPosition = w.scrollTop();
                    var newCss = context.getCss(scrollbarPosition);
     
                    if (newCss !== null) {
                        element.css(newCss);
                    }
                   
                });
            });
        };
    })(jQuery);

	setTimeout(function(){

		// Place the first image and left col social container
		var firstLead = $("#articleLeft p.leadPara").first();
		var lastLead = $("#articleLeft p.leadPara").last();
		spacer.insertAfter(lastLead);
		$("div[itemprop='image']").first().insertAfter(firstLead);
		$("#articleLeft img.nonChart").parent().addClass("nonChartContainer");
		socialLeft.insertAfter(lastLead);
		socialLeft = $("#sharingLeft");
		$("#sharingLeft").floatingElement();

	}, 300);

	(function ($){
		
		var addThisAvailable;

		// Check every 100ms to see if the social widget is on page
		addThisAvailable = setInterval(function() {

			// If it is on page, move it to the left col social container
		    if ($("#sharebar").length > 0) { 

			    $("#sharebar").appendTo("#sharingLeft");
				
				// Its in the right spot, so stop checking				
				clearInterval(addThisAvailable);

                         //Add st_via
                         $(".st_twitter_stbar").attr("st_via", "eMarketer");

			} else {

				// Need logic to kill the first statement if it never gets there

			}			

		}, 100);

	}(jQuery));
	
	$(window).resize(function() {
	    setTimeout(function(){

			// update the stop point for social widget
			stopStick2 = $("#stopStick").offset().top - 348;
			widgetHeight = $("#sharingLeft").height();
			absIt = stopStick2 - (widgetHeight + 55);

	    }, 100);
	});	

	$("#share").click(function(){
		$("#articleToolsShare").animate({
			right: "1px"
		}, 200);
	});

	$("#cancelShare").click(function(){
		$("#articleToolsShare").animate({
			right: "-323px"
		}, 200);
		return false;
	});

	// Create the tooltip
	// Save article title in data
	$(".articlePagination li a").each( function() {
	    var $this = $(this);
	    $this.data("title",$this.attr("title"));
	    $this.removeAttr("title");

	    //update the text in the tooltip
		var prevTitle = $(".prev a").data("title");
		var nextTitle = $(".next a").data("title");

		$("#prevArticleTitle p").text(prevTitle);
		$("#nextArticleTitle p").text(nextTitle);
	});

	$(".articlePagination li a").hover(function(){
	    var $this = $(this);
	    var title = $this.data("title");
	});

	$(".prev a").mouseenter(function(){
		if ($("#prevArticleTitle p").is(":empty")){
			return;
		} else {
			$("#prevArticleTitle").fadeIn();
		}
	});

	$(".next a").hover(function(){
		$("#nextArticleTitle").fadeIn();
	});

	$(".prev a, .next a").mouseleave(function(){
		$("#prevArticleTitle, #nextArticleTitle").fadeOut();
	});

	// Right Col Tabs
	$("ul#assetTabs li").first().addClass("activeTab");
	$(".tabbedContent").first().fadeIn();

	// Tab switch click event
    $("ul#assetTabs li").click(function(){
        $(".tabbedContent").hide();
        $("ul#assetTabs li").removeClass("activeTab");
        $(this).addClass("activeTab");

	    var showContent = $(".activeTab").find("a").attr("href");
	    $(showContent).fadeIn();
	    
	    return false;
    });

	// set domain to match marketo iframe
	document.domain = 'emarketer.com';
	var seenNews = "no";


});
</script>
